backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with data models, in‑memory maps, authorization mixin, and CRUD-style functions for packages, designers, briefs, consultations, notes, user profiles, and product categories.
backend/migration.mo: Implements the upgrade migration function that preserves existing state and seeds new product categories with predefined sample products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to resilient external product image handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React app, router, providers, and top-level routes including product browsing pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to create one and submits it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: Form component allowing authenticated users to submit consultation requests using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper that renders the site header, footer, profile setup dialog, and page content.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer displaying brand info, navigation links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright note.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Responsive header with navigation links, authentication controls, and a mobile menu using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/products/SafeExt: Image component that swaps to a fallback image if the external source fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook fetching the current user's profile once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as packages, designers, briefs, consultations, notes, and profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Hooks for retrieving the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables with global base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Loads and displays the user's project briefs with statuses and navigation to create new projects or view details.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed info for a selected designer, including bio, styles, and portfolio images with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Shows a searchable and filterable list of designers using name and style filters with data loaded from a query hook.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a FAQ section using accordion components with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring hero, features, and calls to action, with navigation based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the platform’s 5‑step process using structured sections with descriptions and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page displaying an error message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Implements a four‑step onboarding quiz to collect room type, style preferences, budget, and timeline, persisting answers to state.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Shows a review of onboarding selections and submits a project brief to the backend, handling authentication and success state.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays design packages in a grid with pricing, features, and a selection action that stores the chosen package.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Fetches and displays product categories with loading, error, and empty states, including image selection logic based on category data.
Displays products for a selected category, handling loading, errors, and empty states, and renders a product grid once data loads.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Shows a detailed project workspace with brief info and notes, allowing authenticated users to add new notes.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: A wrapper that blocks access until Internet Identity authentication is complete, showing a sign‑in prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store managing onboarding selections such as room type, styles, budget, timeline, and chosen package.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for INR currency and timestamps into readable date and datetime strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the sajavathub.com build plan, features, known issues, and architectural notes.
